name: A Perilous Adventure
description:
A small JRPG built in the GB Studio engine.

Keyboard Controls:

Up - Up Arrow / W

Down - Down Arrow / S

Left - Left Arrow / A

Right - Right Arrow / D

A - Alt / Z / J

B - Ctrl / K / X

Start - Enter

Select - Shift

In Game Controls:

Up, Down, Left, Right - Movement / Menu Navigation

A - Interact / Select Menu Option / Progress Dialogue

B - Run (WIP) / Back

Start - Map(WIP, currently not implemented)

Select - Menu

Please Note: This game is still in a very early alpha stage, and as such, all elements may be subject to change. However, feel free to leave any criticism in the comments, and if you find any bugs, please report them to indiedevgames1@gmail.com

Shoutout to PixelPete on YouTube for his free Gameboy art assets!
